Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 43rd overall pick, by Atlanta in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/4/2019, off Lester Reimers (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2019, off Victor Chadwell (NYY)...
Hit for the cycle against Minnesota on 9/9/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2019, hitting .360 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2019, hitting .353 with 9 HR, 25 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2019, hitting .285 with 25 HR, 111 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/17/2020, hitting .448 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,942,857 through salary arbitration...
